allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: implement proper app restart after update

Previously, RestartApp() only called runtime.Quit() which closed the
window but left the app running in systray. Now it properly:
- Saves config
- Unregisters hotkey
- Stops focus monitor
- Quits systray
- Starts new instance via exec.Command
- Exits current instance with os.Exit(0)
EOF
)")
